mapper.select:
SELECT DATE_FORMAT(t1.currTime,'%Y-%m-%d %h:%i:%s') AS currTime, t1.deviceId AS deviceId, t5.type AS deviceType, t4.orgCode AS orgCode, t4.orgName AS orgName, t5.deviceName AS deviceName, t3.meterPressure AS meterPressure, t3.ambientTemp AS ambientTemp, ( SELECT t2.attrValue FROM attr_value t2 WHERE t1.id = t2.foreignId AND t1.currTime = t2.currTime AND t2.attrKey = '储罐压力' AND t2.delFlag = '0' ) AS storagePressure, ( SELECT t2.attrValue FROM attr_value t2 WHERE t1.id = t2.foreignId AND t1.currTime = t2.currTime AND t2.attrKey = 'LNG液位' AND t2.delFlag = '0' ) AS lngLiquidPosition, ( SELECT t2.attrValue FROM attr_value t2 WHERE t1.id = t2.foreignId AND t1.currTime = t2.currTime AND t2.attrKey = 'LNG差压' AND t2.delFlag = '0' ) AS differentialPressure, ( SELECT t2.attrValue FROM attr_value t2 WHERE t1.id = t2.foreignId AND t1.currTime = t2.currTime AND t2.attrKey = 'LNG高度' AND t2.delFlag = '0' ) AS lngHeight, ( SELECT t2.attrValue FROM attr_value t2 WHERE t1.id = t2.foreignId AND t1.currTime = t2.currTime AND t2.attrKey = 'LNG重量' AND t2.delFlag = '0' ) AS lngWeight, ( SELECT t2.attrValue FROM attr_value t2 WHERE t1.id = t2.foreignId AND t1.currTime = t2.currTime AND t2.attrKey = '泵前压力' AND t2.delFlag = '0' AND t1.orgId = t4.id AND t4.orgType = '2001' ) AS beforePressure, ( SELECT t2.attrValue FROM attr_value t2 WHERE t1.id = t2.foreignId AND t1.currTime = t2.currTime AND t2.attrKey = '泵后压力' AND t2.delFlag = '0' AND t1.orgId = t4.id AND t4.orgType = '2001' ) AS affterPressure, ( SELECT t2.attrValue FROM attr_value t2 WHERE t1.id = t2.foreignId AND t1.currTime = t2.currTime AND t2.attrKey = '泵池温度' AND t2.delFlag = '0' AND t1.orgId = t4.id AND t4.orgType = '2001' ) AS pumpTemp, ( SELECT t2.attrValue FROM attr_value t2 WHERE t1.id = t2.foreignId AND t1.currTime = t2.currTime AND t2.attrKey = '变频器频率' AND t2.delFlag = '0' AND t1.orgId = t4.id AND t4.orgType = '2001' ) AS converterFrequency, ( SELECT t2.attrValue FROM attr_value t2 WHERE t1.id = t2.foreignId AND t1.currTime = t2.currTime AND t2.attrKey = '变频器电流' AND t2.delFlag = '0' AND t1.orgId = t4.id AND t4.orgType = '2001' ) AS converterCurrent, ( SELECT t2.attrValue FROM attr_value t2 WHERE t1.id = t2.foreignId AND t1.currTime = t2.currTime AND t2.attrKey = '汽化器后压力' AND t2.delFlag = '0' AND t1.orgId = t4.id AND t4.orgType = '3001' ) AS cbtBeforePressure, ( SELECT t2.attrValue FROM attr_value t2 WHERE t1.id = t2.foreignId AND t1.currTime = t2.currTime AND t2.attrKey = '汽化器后温度' AND t2.delFlag = '0' AND t1.orgId = t4.id AND t4.orgType = '3001' ) AS cbtAffterTemp, ( SELECT t2.attrValue FROM attr_value t2 WHERE t1.id = t2.foreignId AND t1.currTime = t2.currTime AND t2.attrKey = '流量计温度' AND t2.delFlag = '0' AND t1.orgId = t4.id AND t4.orgType = '3001' ) AS flowmeterTemp, ( SELECT t2.attrValue FROM attr_value t2 WHERE t1.id = t2.foreignId AND t1.currTime = t2.currTime AND t2.attrKey = '流量计瞬时流量' AND t2.delFlag = '0' AND t1.orgId = t4.id AND t4.orgType = '3001' ) AS flowmeterInstFlow, ( SELECT t2.attrValue FROM attr_value t2 WHERE t1.id = t2.foreignId AND t1.currTime = t2.currTime AND t2.attrKey = '流量计压力' AND t2.delFlag = '0' AND t1.orgId = t4.id AND t4.orgType = '3001' ) AS flowmeterPressure, ( SELECT t2.attrValue FROM attr_value t2 WHERE t1.id = t2.foreignId AND t1.currTime = t2.currTime AND t2.attrKey = '流量计总流量' AND t2.delFlag = '0' AND t1.orgId = t4.id AND t4.orgType = '3001' ) AS flowmeterTotalFlow FROM attr_key t1, attr_status t3, sys_orga t4, sys_device t5 WHERE t1.orgId = t4.id AND t1.orgId = t3.orgId AND t1.currTime = t3.currTime AND t1.deviceId = t5.deviceId AND t1.delFlag = '0' AND t3.delFlag = '0' AND t4.delFlag = '0'
and t4.orgCode = '${orgCode}'
and t4.orgName like '%${orgName}%'
and t1.currTime >= '${currTimeFrom}'
and t.currTime <= '${currTimeTo}'
order by t1.currTime desc, t1.deviceId asc
